column4: i'm after help with installing my wifi on ubuntu - i've got ndiswrapper installed
i've got two cards - one's a belkin 54g v3 (difficult to install i've been told) the other is a buffalo g54s
i dont know what to do now
i've got the driver (inf) file but it wont copy it?
put the easy one in and open a terminal: iwconfig   does it show up?
you are just about done!!! PM?
PM not working 4 one of us
iwlist eth1 scan   ,to get essid of router
also there is no light on the card
you pastebin looks like its good to go if we can command it to connect to a specific access point
